data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during SPARTIATE cruise from Teneriffe to Rio de Janeiro started at 1823-10-15
Ship: Spartiate (3rd Rate Frigate), Voyage: Teneriffe - Rio De Janeiro, 1st Observer: Thomas Owen Knox (1st Officer/Master), Company: Royal Navy, Other ship information: 76G 1949BM
CLIWOC: A Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750–1854 (and 10 more publications about CLIWOC results in the same volume)
